Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: This was significantly different ( P less than 0 . 02 ) from the cerebrospinal fluid : plasma ratio previously defined in children receiving a 16 - mg / kg total dose of busulfan .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| busulfan |
| cerebrospinal fluid |
| plasma |

Note: In this paragraph, "busulfan" is a drug used to treat certain diseases, but it is not a disease entity itself. "Cerebrospinal fluid" and "plasma" are not diseases, but rather bodily fluids that are being compared in the context of the paragraph. Therefore, the only disease entity in the paragraph is "busulfan".
